text:
I just innstelled Apache 2.0 an when I try to wiew the fils on the sever from 
a computer located elswere the massages I get is: this page can not be 
displayed or cant finde server.  Any commnets???????
creator: helgi.g@simnet.is
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
This clearly doesn't sound like a bug so I'd suggest to take this to an appropriate user support 
forum instead of 'abusing' the bug database.

Please have a look at http://httpd.apache.org/bug_report.htm, http://httpd.apache.org/
userslist.html and http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users for further info.

Btw, your version of Apache 2 is pretty old; perhaps you might want to upgrade at first?
